channel.title: Posts on Dimitris Alexandridis
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on Dimitris Alexandridis

item.title: Hello World!
item.description: I recently came across Hugo the other day while reading this article of my dear friends at deltahacker.gr. Thought it’d be a cool little project to make a personal website using Hugo in order to get to know the glory of static website generators and tick “Make a personal website” off my weekly checklist. It’s been a fun experience and a nice break from revising Linear Algebra.. Next task is to find out why the site’s favicon won’t appear on Chrome browsers and maybe brainstorm ways I can make use of this place.
item.content:
I recently came across Hugo the other day while reading this article of my dear friends at deltahacker.gr. Thought it’d be a cool little project to make a personal website using Hugo in order to get to know the glory of static website generators and tick “Make a personal website” off my weekly checklist.

It’s been a fun experience and a nice break from revising Linear Algebra.. Next task is to find out why the site’s favicon won’t appear on Chrome browsers and maybe brainstorm ways I can make use of this place.
